com.microsoft.azure.management.resources

Class ResourceGroupOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.resources.ResourceGroupOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceGroupOperations, ServiceOperations<ResourceManagementClientImpl>

    public class ResourceGroupOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceOperations<ResourceManagementClientImpl>, ResourceGroupOperations
    Operations for managing resource groups.

Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:
        ExecutionException - Thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception. This exception can be inspected using the Throwable.getCause() method.
        IOException - Thrown if there was an error setting up tracing for the request.

      • patchAsync

        public Future<ResourceGroupPatchResult> patchAsync(String resourceGroupName,
                                                   ResourceGroup parameters)
        Resource groups can be updated through a simple PATCH operation to a group address. The format of the request is the same as that for creating a resource groups, though if a field is unspecified current value will be carried over.
        Specified by:
        patchAsync in interface ResourceGroupOperations
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the resource group to be created or updated. The name is case insensitive.
        parameters - Required. Parameters supplied to the update state resource group service operation.
        Returns:
        Resource group information.

      • patch

        public ResourceGroupPatchResult patch(String resourceGroupName,
                                      ResourceGroup parameters)
                               throws IOException,
                                      ServiceException
        Resource groups can be updated through a simple PATCH operation to a group address. The format of the request is the same as that for creating a resource groups, though if a field is unspecified current value will be carried over.
        Specified by:
        patch in interface ResourceGroupOperations
        Parameters:
        resourceGroupName - Required. The name of the resource group to be created or updated. The name is case insensitive.
        parameters - Required. Parameters supplied to the update state resource group service operation.
        Returns:
        Resource group information.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
